reviews.review: Absolutely terrible so predictable and a waste of time I do not recommend!
lol cancer lmfao kill urself m8
why did the even make a movie about emojis?

I have never seen something so wholly awful in my life.
I was expecting to be able to go and make fun of it, because, lets face it, nobody expected it to be good. I thought it would at least be good for the purpose of jest and a little self depreciation on the films part.

But no

I was instead subjected to the longest ad made in the history of mankind. Time stretched to impossible lengths, similar to that of someone sucked into a black hole. My eyes flitted to my friend watching with me, who had a watch on. A look of sheer exhaustion and pain across my face. To my amazement and woe, he responded "there's still over an hour left." I desired to get up and leave multiple times, but alas I had to pay for my sins. My sins of supporting this movie, for wanting to go in the first place, and for dragging an innocent down with me. Every time a pun was made (which was approximately every 3 seconds) I felt a metaphorical knife being driven into my very being. The fact that so many poop emoji puns can be crammed into the 4 minutes of screen time that emoji had was utterly astonishing.
I am ashamed to be right on the cusp of this generation. Even as I type this, the fact that I have used emojis with these fingers before shakes me to my core and fills me with regret and self loathing.
I have seen the depths of hell. I am changed forever. I will never get back that piece of me that the Emoji Movie stole from me. My only purpose on this earth now is to prevent the death of more innocent souls. Do not go to the Emoji Movie. Do not make the mistakes I made. I was young and naive. But I still must pay for the evil deed I so willingly did. And with such excitement. I see the error of my ways now.
Poor... Unfunny.... Boring movie which has no thrills and lacks everything and a good concept wasted??

Kids Korner: The EMOJI Movie 

Why all the hate? Not the worst film of the year, but generally it left a feeling of... Meh!

Reel Dialogue discussion: What is our personal value? 

https://russellingreveiws.blogspot.com.au/2017/09/kids-korner-emoji-movie-not-worst-film.html

I had no expectations for this film, but my sisters out-ruled me to go see it (isn't that how we all saw it) but it actually was goodish. I expected it to be worse, but it had its ups, but mostly downs. It was all for the money. But after some other movie trailers I saw I think the emoji movie look like a great film.
As funny as you'd expect for a movie about emojis, such a pointless film with very few laughs.
